Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Haplotype analysis using 6 RFLPs provides additional data that the I113F mutation originated from a common ancestor .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| None |

The paragraph does not mention any specific diseases. It is about the use of haplotype analysis with 6 RFLPs (Restriction Fragment Length Polymorphisms) to determine the origin of the I113F mutation.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| I113F mutation |

The paragraph mentions the "I113F mutation" but does not mention any specific diseases associated with it. Haplotype analysis using 6 RFLPs is a method used to study genetic variations and their relationship to each other and to specific traits or mutations, but it is not a disease itself.
